title.en: The Summoning of Blessings Which Brings Them Swift and Fast

text.en: Hūṃ!   From the space of the dharmadhātu, rise up
text.en-trans: hung chö kyi ying né ku kyö la

text.en: Peaceful and wrathful sugatas, and shower down your blessing!
From the eight charnel grounds, rise up,
text.en-trans: durtrö gyé né ku kyö la

text.en: O vidyādharas, and shower down your blessing!
text.en-trans: rigdzin nam kyi jin pob chik

text.en: From the realm of Ngayab Ling, rise up
text.en-trans: ngayab ling né ku kyö la

text.en: Dorjé Tötreng, and shower down your blessing!
From the land of Orgyen, rise up
text.en-trans: orgyen yul né ku kyö la

text.en: Host of ḍākinīs, and shower down your blessing!
text.en-trans: khandrö tsok kyi jin pob chik

text.en: From the highest reaches of space, rise up
text.en-trans: namkhé tong né ku kyö la

text.en: Vajra piśācīs, and shower down your blessing!
From the peaks of the white snow mountains, rise up
text.en-trans: gangkar tsé né ku kyö la

text.en: Great vajra kiṃkaras, and shower down your blessing!
text.en-trans: dorjé ging chen jin pob chik

text.en: From the depths of the oceans, rise up
Ḍākinīs of the islands, and shower down your blessing!
text.en-trans: tso ling khandrö jin pob chik

text.en: In the practice places of India, of Nepal and Tibet,
text.en-trans: gya bal bö kyi drubné su

text.en: Master Padmākara, you attained
The siddhis of the eight sugatas of Kagyé
And of Vajrakīlaya; in the same way
Pour down your blessings on us here now!
text.en-trans: dengdir dak la jin pob chik

text.en: Grant us the attainments, ordinary and supreme!
Hūṃ!   On one thousand realms in the centre, where
text.en-trans: hung ü chok tong gi jikten gyi

text.en: All forms perceived are the deities of Kīlaya,
All sounds are Buddhakīlaya:
Shower down the wisdom mind blessing of the sugatas!
text.en-trans: deshek tuk kyi jin pob chik

text.en: On one thousand realms in the east, where
All forms perceived are the deities of Kīlaya,
All sounds are Vajrakīlaya:
Shower down the wisdom body blessing of the sugatas!
text.en-trans: deshek ku yi jin pob chik

text.en: On one thousand realms in the south, where
text.en-trans: lhochok tong gi jik ten gyi

text.en: All forms perceived are the deities of Kīlaya,
All sounds are Ratnakīlaya:
Shower down the blessing of noble qualities of the sugatas!
On one thousand realms in the west, where
All forms perceived are the deities of Kīlaya,
All sounds are Padmakīlaya:
Shower down the wisdom speech blessing of the sugatas!
text.en-trans: deshek sung gi chin pob chik

text.en: On one thousand realms in the north, where
All forms perceived are the deities of Kīlaya,
All sounds are Karmakīlaya:
Shower down the blessing of the enlightened activity of the sugatas!
Peaceful and wrathful deities of the sugatas of five families,
Buddhas of the three times, surrounded by your retinues,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa khor ché kyi

text.en: On this place of practice, shower down your blessings!
text.en-trans: drubpé né dir jin pob chik

text.en: Make this maṇḍala shine and glow in splendour!
text.en-trans: kyilkhor di la dang chik chung

text.en: Grant us yogins and yoginīs the four empowerments!
text.en-trans: naljor dak la wang zhi kur

text.en: Dispel all negative and obstructing forces that lead astray!
Show us the signs and marks of the siddhis!
text.en-trans: tak dang tsenma ngö su tön

text.en: Grant us the attainments, ordinary, and supreme!
